mapper.update:
update IMOS_LO_Bin
Material_Code = #{物料代码, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Material_Name = #{物料名称, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Bar_Code = #{条码编号, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Material_TypeCode = #{类型代码, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Material_TypeName = #{类型名称, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Pallet_No = #{托盘编号, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Bin_No = #{库位编号, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Bin_Type = #{库位类型, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Bin_Status = #{库位状态, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Bin_UseFlag = #{库位禁用, jdbcType=INTEGER},
Material_Spec = #{物料规格, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Plan_No = #{计划编号, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Batch_No = #{生产批次, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Material_Weight = #{物料重量, jdbcType=NUMERIC},
Product_Date = #{生产日期, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
In_Date = #{入库时间, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where Material_Code = #{物料代码}

update IMOS_LO_Bin set Material_Code = NULL ,Material_Name = NULL ,Material_TypeCode = NULL ,Material_TypeName = NULL ,Pallet_No = NULL ,Bin_Status = '_' ,Bin_UseFlag = NULL ,Bar_Code = NULL ,Material_Spec = NULL ,Plan_No = NULL ,Batch_No = NULL ,Material_Weight = NULL ,Product_Date = NULL ,In_Date = NULL ,Creation_Date = NULL ,Created_By = NULL ,Last_Update_Date = NULL ,Last_Updated_By = NULL where Bin_No = #{库位编号}
update IMOS_LO_Bin set Bin_Status = 'Q' where Bin_No = #{库位编号}

from IMOS_LO_Bin WHERE Bin_Status = '_' AND Bin_Type = 'E'

update.id: 入库任务更改库位信息

mapper.update: update IMOS_LO_Bin set Material_Code = NULL ,Material_Name = NULL ,Material_TypeCode = NULL ,Material_TypeName = NULL ,Pallet_No = NULL ,Bin_Status = '_' ,Bar_Code = NULL ,Bin_UseFlag = 0 ,Material_Spec = NULL ,Plan_No = NULL ,Batch_No = NULL ,Material_Weight = NULL ,Product_Date = NULL ,In_Date = NULL WHERE Bin_No = #{库位编号}
